node.title: What to do to avoid/treat burnout: Enhancing Emotional Wellbeing
node.description: OBJECTIVES At the conclusion of this CME activity, the learner should be better able to: 1. Identify how to recognize burn out. 2. Understand key lifestyle factors that avoid burnout. 3. When the cat is out of the bag—know how to treat burnout. 4. Understand the most important Christian principle that reverses burnout. 6. Demonstrate how to fulfill that need once it is recognized.
